name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
June 13, Tianjin University
It was reported online that a girl dumped food on a boy's head. According to the boy's friend, the three of them were discussing that cat poop smells bad. He also said that he was slapped by the girl when he chased her to ask for an explanation. After that, the police arrived at the scene to deal with it. The girl compensated 300 yuan but did not apologize publicly.
On June 14, a reporter contacted the school and the police, and both the school and the police responded that they had intervened.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 14, Zhengzhou University South Campus
A man dressed as a woman and sneaked into the women's bathhouse to take photos. He was stopped by female students in the canteen and asked to delete the photos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Summary of past tweets
November 25, 2022, Urumqi Night

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen added: The person who took the photos was a 2015 undergraduate and graduate student at Shandong University. He was arrested last fall and sentenced to eight years in prison.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission, June 14.
Recently, news about "Fukushima will discharge nuclear waste water again" has attracted attention inside the Great Firewall.
However, a blogger found through comparison that the discharge standard of Fukushima nuclear waste water, which has been reviewed and approved by the International Atomic Energy Agency, is actually higher than the existing standard in China.
By comparison, the tritium dilution standard for Fukushima this time is 1500 becquerel per liter, while the standard set by Qinshan Nuclear Power Plant, which is also a coastal nuclear power plant located in Hangzhou Bay, in 2007 was 3700 becquerel per liter of tritium dilution, and it has not changed since then.
In other words, in the past 16 years, Qinshan Nuclear Power Plant has been discharging nuclear waste water into Hangzhou Bay at a rate twice that of Fukushima.
At the same time, China's "Regulations on Environmental Radiation Protection of Nuclear Power Plants GB6249-2011" stipulates that the total amount of radioactive tritium discharged must be less than 7.5 times 10 to the 13th power becquerel per year. Japan plans to discharge 1 million tons in 2023. Based on the seawater density of 1,100 grams per liter and the concentration of 1,500 becquerel per liter, the annual discharge is about 1.36 times 10 to the 12th power becquerel, which is far below the national standard. 
In addition, the alarm threshold set by the Qinshan Nuclear Power Plant is 10,000 becquerel per liter of radioactive tritium, which means that Fukushima's discharge plan is far less terrible than what is portrayed online. 
However, when the blogger posted this article on Xiaohongshu, he was immediately banned from the platform permanently.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Later, Shenzhen Metro staff said they had not received any notification to remove the advertisement.
However, the animal protection organization that placed the advertisement said that the relevant advertisement was still removed.
The reason was that "cow cat", "corgi", "legislation" and "minors" could not appear.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@MotulX22 The core of this tweet is that the nuclear wastewater discharge standard of Qinshan Nuclear Power Plant is twice that of Fukushima.
So now it shouldn’t be me who drinks it, it should be you who drinks the nuclear wastewater of Qinshan Nuclear Power Plant to prove that the discharge of Qinshan Nuclear Power Plant is safe and qualified.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
On June 15, the People's Daily published an article criticizing the Palace Museum for its large number of commercial filming activities, which was ridiculed by the "Palace Museum Big G" incident in the comment section

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 15, Beijing Workers' Stadium
A fan broke into the stadium, hugged Messi and walked around the field, causing the whole audience to cheer and shout "Awesome".
This behavior once caused the live broadcast to be interrupted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, because he was under 18, he was put back in the stands and was surrounded by fans for photos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Post-match interview
The teenager said that the security at the scene was not good, and many security guards were looking back at the game, so he felt that no one could catch him.
